ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras: 4*SONY CCD Small Pinhole Camera, 425TV line, You Can Virtually Hide it Anywhere, Dimension: 35.5mm/35.5mm, Super Low 0.5Lux Works Great In Low Light;; 4*SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 520 TV lines, 26 IR LEDs. 3.6mm Len for Wide Angle View. Metal vandal proof & water proof.
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 960×480 & 30FPS Recording, HI 3521 CPU. Supports HDMI & VGA
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Value CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time 30FPS Recording, 8 Sony CCD Cameras, iPhone Android Viewable
